name: Step Quest
description:
The world is much larger than it looks. Choose your path and see what you discover. No two play-throughs are ever the same. What treasures await?


Strike down small or mighty foes!



Your actions will add or remove possible spawns in this world. For locations, characters, enemies, items and more. What's the right choice?


A deep and intriguing story, with enough lightheartedness to make you smile.


Acquire treasures that will help you along, or curse you irreversibly. Only the rich fear loss.



Fulfill quests from a large varied cast of characters. Each with their own goals and dreams. Help them, out of love or out of need. There is always a choice.



You'll do it all over. No matter how much you die. Until you uncover the truth; but can you?
